about_the_game:
🍽️ Summary from cooking diaries 🍽️

👨‍🍳 Hire a new chef if the food is overcooked again

☕️ Coffee always comes with free baking

🏃 There are never enough waitress

🥱 Barista shouldn't be sleepy

PS: These and other rules of the restaurant business, you will only learn by playing Cafe Dash: Cooking, Diner Game!

Work your way up from a small café in a shopping mall to a gourmet restaurant empire - a favorite place of entertainment for show business stars!

In our game you will be able to develop your restaurant business, as well as: manage your staff, fulfill your clients' wishes, renew your equipment, and surprise everybody with new dishes from all over the world!

Use different boosters to move towards your goal faster and overcome difficult levels!

French aesthetics, Italian classics, exclusive fusion or molecular cuisine - how YOUR business story will evolve is for you to decide!

And don't forget to pet our cute kitty - because your mood depends on it! And not only yours, but all the visitors of your restaurant empire!

name: Cafe Dash: Cooking, Diner Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 1.5Gb of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game can likely run on lower rated hardware, but we can't guarantee the performance or provide support.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 3.1Ghz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This recommended is based on what many of us tested the game on while in development. We're confident it supports a smooth experience.

short_description: 🍽️🍕Your dream restaurants and cafes awaits! ❤️ Addictive levels and unique locations ✈️ Hours of entertainment in the time-management genre ⏰
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
